name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Definio: Multi-modal AI Copilot - Claude3 Opus, ChatGPT 4o, Gemini 1.5 Pro

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Access latest AI models in your sidebar, translate, search definitions, create notes and learn - all in one place

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Definio is your ultimate multi-modal copilot, revolutionizing your browsing experience by harnessing the power of the latest Language Learning Models (LLMs) and cutting-edge AI technology.

üöÄ Available chat models:
- OpenAI: GPT-4o, GPT-4-Turbo, GPT-3.5-Turbo
- Anthropic: Claude3 Opus, Sonnet, Haiku
- Google: Gemini 1.5 Pro, Gemini 1.0 Pro
- Custom: Over 30 fine-tuned, RAG-based models for enriched context in various subjects

üåü Unleash the Power of Multiple LLMs in a Single Chat:
With Definio, you have the ability to ask intricate questions and receive precise and informative responses, all tailored to the website context. Select any text you want to analyze, and seamlessly interact with multiple LLMs within a single chat. This capability allows you to cross-validate answers, gather diverse perspectives, and bring the most relevant models into the conversation, providing accurate, comprehensive, and contextually relevant insights in real-time.

üåê Effortless Translation Across Languages:
Definio's powerful translation feature allows you to instantly translate any selected text into your preferred language. With support for a vast array of languages and an intuitive interface, breaking down language barriers has never been easier. Easily switch between languages and save your translations for future reference, enhancing your language learning journey and cross-cultural understanding.

üìö Comprehensive Dictionary Search:
Enhance your vocabulary and explore a world of definitions and related information with Definio's Multiple Dictionary Search. By simply clicking a word, you gain access to over 500,000 words in our database. We support the renowned Oxford Dictionary and offer condensed and summarized notes sourced from Wikipedia. Customize your queries to find synonyms, antonyms, and similar words effortlessly. Additionally, our text-to-speech feature lets you listen to word pronunciations, enriching your language learning experience. The found definitions can be easily added to your digital notebooks for future reference and study.

üóíÔ∏è Note-Taking and Learning Made Simple:
Definio goes beyond being just an AI-powered assistant by offering a seamless note-taking experience. Create and customize your digital notebooks to organize information by topics, subjects, and languages. Enjoy flexibility in transferring, editing, and personalizing your records, ensuring your knowledge is always at your fingertips. This feature allows you to seamlessly integrate research and knowledge acquisition into your study routine.

üéì Personalized Learning:
Take your learning to the next level with personalized study sessions based on advanced research in psychology and neuroscience. Utilizing techniques such as spaced repetition and active recall, our algorithm tracks your learning and customizes your sessions for maximum retention and minimal repetition. Tailor your study sessions to fit your individual needs and preferences, whether you're preparing for a test, learning a new skill, or simply expanding your knowledge. Definio's personalized learning feature is designed to help you succeed effectively and efficiently.

üîç A Continuously Evolving Knowledge Base:
Definio is committed to keeping you ahead of the curve with a constantly growing and updating database. As new information emerges, Definio ensures you have access to the latest and most relevant content, supporting your ongoing learning and skill development.

‚ö° Simplify Your Workflows with Powerful Shortcuts:
Definio offers a variety of shortcuts designed to streamline your everyday productivity and learning workflows. From quickly summarizing articles to generating concise meeting notes, Definio's intuitive shortcuts help you accomplish tasks faster and more efficiently.

Experience the future of browsing and learning with Definio ‚Äì your multi-modal copilot that combines the power of advanced AI, seamless translation, and personalized learning to help you explore, understand, and grow like never before.
